name: proj-persona/PersonaHub
description: The PersonaHub dataset, introduced in the paper 'Scaling Synthetic Data Creation with 1,000,000,000 Personas', presents a groundbreaking persona-driven data synthesis methodology. This methodology utilizes a large language model (LLM) to create diverse synthetic data by leveraging multiple perspectives. The dataset, known as PERSONA HUB, contains 1 billion diverse personas automatically curated from web data, representing a significant portion of the world's population. These personas serve as carriers of world knowledge, enabling the creation of a vast array of synthetic data for various scenarios, including mathematical and logical reasoning problems, user prompts, knowledge-rich texts, game NPCs, and tools.
